definition: 4-Hydroxybenzoate + NADPH + Bromide + Oxygen + 2 H+ <=> 3-Bromo-4-hydroxybenzoate + NADP+ + 2 H2O
comment: the first step of two-step reaction (see R12013, R12015+R12016)
